author: chaserxy
content: a meta-question: with the Gas Station Network and `permit`-style methods in token contracts (https://github.com/makerdao/dss/blob/master/src/dai.sol#L122) already exiting for a long time, why are metatransactions still an unsolved problem?

author: lightclient
content: <@!451873750502342686> there are many more problems beyond just sending tokens without an approval

author: lightclient
content: even if there weren't, `permit` doesn't work with early ERC-20 tokens

author: chaserxy
content: <@!543900561460822016> that's for sure. but how about GSN?

author: lightclient
content: GSN requires either i) everyone deploy a smart contract wallet or ii) every contract supports GSN

author: chaserxy
content: I see. that's quite limiting. in i), does "everyone" mean every user?

author: lightclient
content: every current and future EOA user
